channel.title: 639 idle packet
channel.description: Does anyone know what packet the 639 sends with the amount of time idle so I can set it to log out my players after a certain amount of time? I've searched everywhere and I couldn't find it. It logs out after like 10 seconds in the lobby, but not actually in game.

item.title: 639 idle packet
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

Does anyone know what packet the 639 sends with the amount of time idle so I can set it to log out my players after a certain amount of time? I’ve searched everywhere and I couldn’t find it. It logs out after like 10 seconds in the lobby, but not actually in game.
